articles.title: Ex-Binance CEO Zhao urges judge to allow him to leave US before sentencing - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Zhao, a citizen of the UAE and Canada, stepped down as CEO of Binance on Tuesday after pleading guilty to willfully causing the global cryptocurrency exchange to fail to maintain an effective anti-money laundering program.
